name: convert-to-inferred

schema.description: Convert existing Vite project(s) using `@nx/vite:*` executors to use `@nx/vite/plugin`. Defaults to migrating all projects. Pass '--project' to migrate only one target.
schema.title: Convert Vite project from executor to plugin

project.description: The project to convert from using the `@nx/vite:*` executors to use `@nx/vite/plugin`.

skipFormat.description: Whether to format files at the end of the migration.

description: Convert existing Vite project(s) using `@nx/vite:*` executors to use `@nx/vite/plugin`. Defaults to migrating all projects. Pass '--project' to migrate only one target.
